title: Identify M&A Target
description: A corporate development team wants to identify potential acquisition targets: small-scale renewable energy developers with projects in a specific region.

tasks.description: Scan public databases and industry news for renewable project developers with a portfolio of 50-200 MW in the target region.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a list of 5 potential target companies.

tasks.description: For each target, compile a profile including their project pipeline, key management personnel, and any available financial data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed profile for each of the 5 companies.

tasks.description: Perform a preliminary valuation of the most promising target based on their project pipeline and comparable transactions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a rough valuation range for the top target.
